DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine clinical result contribution surgical success , complication mix type mesh material well prolen mesh material sling surgery 3 year follow-up first time literature .
DOC.brief_title: Synthetic Mesh Materials In Sling Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Broad base double forced sling operation perform 144 patient use 3 different type mesh material 2004 2007 . Group I consist 48 patient Vypromesh® ( Ethicon , USA ) use ; Group II consist 48 patient Ultrapromesh® ( Ethicon , USA ) Group III consist 48 patient Prolene light mesh® ( Johnson & Johnson , USA ) use . The data patient success operation evaluate base 24hr pad test , ICIQ-SF scoring , Korman questionnaire analysis . Main outcome measure : The Ultrapromesh® synthetic sling procedure low complication incidence high success rate synthetic sling 3-year follow-up .
DOC.criteria: Stress urinary incontinence Mix urinary incontinence Previous fail antiincontinence surgery Previous gynecologic surgery Urodynamical detrusor overactivity impaired bladder activity Prolaps pelvic organ Urge incontinence Neurogenic bladder Bladder outlet obstruction Urinary fistula , Pregnancy Active urinary vaginal enfection Contraindication anesthesia > 100ml PVR urine volume
DOC.keyword: The Ultrapromesh® synthetic sling procedure low complication incidence high success rate synthetic sling 3-year follow-up .
